verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> that came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> concerning all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> (the same was the <S%H7224>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>),

which <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and to all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H559>saying:<s%>

From the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H526>Amon,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> even to this <S%H3117>day,<s%> these <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has come to <S%H1696>me,<s%> and I have spoken to <S%H7925>you,<s%> rising up early and <S%H1696>speaking;<s%> but you have not <S%H8085>listened.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> to you all his <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> rising up <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H7971>sending<s%> <S%H8085>them<s%> (but you have not listened, nor <S%H5186>inclined<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%>)

<S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7725>Return<s%> now <S%H376>everyone<s%> from his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> and from the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of your <S%H4611>doings,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> to you and to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> from of old and <S%H5769%H99999>even<s%> <S%H5769>forevermore;<s%>

and <S%H3212>don't<s%> go <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> them or <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H3707>them,<s%> and don't provoke me to anger with the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands;<s%> and I will do you no <S%H7489>harm.<s%>

Yet you have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> to <S%H5002>me,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> that you may provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands<s%> to your own <S%H7451>hurt.<s%>
Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies:<s%> Because you have not <S%H8085>heard<s%> my <S%H1697>words,<s%>

<S%H7971>behold,<s%> I will send and <S%H3947>take<s%> all the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and I will send to <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> my <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and will <S%H935>bring<s%> them against this <S%H776>land,<s%> and against its <S%H3427>inhabitants,<s%> and against all these <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5439>around;<s%> and I will utterly <S%H2763>destroy<s%> <S%H7760>them,<s%> and make them an <S%H8047>astonishment,<s%> and a <S%H8322>hissing,<s%> and <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2723>desolations.<s%>

Moreover I will <S%H6>take<s%> from them the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8342>mirth<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8057>gladness,<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3618>bride,<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7347>millstones,<s%> and the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H5216>lamp.<s%>

This whole <S%H776>land<s%> shall be a <S%H2723>desolation,<s%> and an <S%H8047>astonishment;<s%> and these <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

It shall <S%H7657>happen,<s%> when seventy <S%H8141>years<s%> are <S%H4390>accomplished,<s%> that I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and that <S%H1471>nation,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans;<s%> and I will <S%H7760>make<s%> it <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

I will <S%H935>bring<s%> on that <S%H776>land<s%> all my <S%H1697>words<s%> which I have <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> against <S%H3789>it,<s%> even all that is written in this <S%H5612>book,<s%> which <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> has <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> against all the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

For <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall make <S%H5647>bondservants<s%> of <S%H7999>them,<s%> even of them; and I will recompense them according to their <S%H6467>deeds,<s%> and according to the <S%H4639>work<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H3947>me:<s%> take this <S%H3563>cup<s%> of the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of <S%H2534>wrath<s%> at my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and cause all the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> to whom I <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H8248>you,<s%> to drink it.
They shall <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and <S%H1607>reel<s%> back and <S%H1984>forth,<s%> and be mad, <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> that I will send among <S%H7971>them.<s%>

Then <S%H3947>took<s%> I the <S%H3563>cup<s%> at <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and made all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> to <S%H8248>drink,<s%> to whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had sent <S%H7971>me:<s%>

<S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and its <S%H4428>kings,<s%> and its <S%H8269>princes,<s%> to <S%H5414>make<s%> them a <S%H2723>desolation,<s%> an <S%H8047>astonishment,<s%> a <S%H8322>hissing,<s%> and a <S%H7045>curse,<s%> as it is this <S%H3117>day;<s%>
<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and his <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and all his <S%H5971>people;<s%>

and all the <S%H6153>mixed<s%> <S%H4428>people,<s%> and all the kings of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H5780>Uz,<s%> and all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H776>the<s%> <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H831>Ashkelon,<s%> and <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> and <S%H6138>Ekron,<s%> and the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H795>Ashdod;<s%>
<S%H123>Edom,<s%> and <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon;<s%>

and all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> and all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6721>Sidon,<s%> and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H339>isle<s%> which is <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3220>sea;<s%>
<S%H1719>Dedan,<s%> and <S%H8485>Tema,<s%> and <S%H938>Buz,<s%> and all who have the <S%H6285>corners<s%> of their beard cut <S%H7112>off;<s%>
and all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6152>Arabia,<s%> and all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the mixed <S%H6153>people<s%> who <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%>
and all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H2174>Zimri,<s%> and all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> and all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H4074>Medes;<s%>

and all the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> <S%H7350>far<s%> and <S%H7138>near,<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> with <S%H251>another;<s%> and all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>world,<s%> which are on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H127>earth:<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8347>Sheshach<s%> shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> after <S%H310>them.<s%>

You shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H8354>Drink,<s%> and be <S%H7937>drunk,<s%> <S%H7006>vomit,<s%> <S%H5307>fall,<s%> and <S%H6965>rise<s%> no <S%H6440>more,<s%> because of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> which I will send among <S%H7971>you.<s%>

It shall <S%H3985>be,<s%> if they refuse to <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> at your <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H8354>drink,<s%> then you shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies:<s%> You shall <S%H8354>surely<s%> <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

<S%H2490>For,<s%> behold, I begin to work <S%H7489>evil<s%> at the <S%H5892>city<s%> which is <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name;<s%> and should you be <S%H5352>utterly<s%> <S%H5352>unpunished?<s%> You shall not be <S%H5352>unpunished;<s%> for I will <S%H7121>call<s%> for a <S%H2719>sword<s%> on all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>

Therefore <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> you against them all these <S%H1697>words,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H3068>them,<s%> Yahweh will <S%H7580>roar<s%> from on <S%H4791>high,<s%> and <S%H5414>utter<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> from his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4583>habitation;<s%> he will <S%H7580>mightily<s%> <S%H7580>roar<s%> against his <S%H5116>fold;<s%> he will <S%H6030>give<s%> a <S%H1959>shout,<s%> as those who <S%H1869>tread<s%> <S%H3427>grapes,<s%> against all the inhabitants of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

A <S%H7588>noise<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> even to the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has a <S%H7379>controversy<s%> with the <S%H1471>nations;<s%> he will enter into <S%H8199>judgment<s%> with all <S%H1320>flesh:<s%> as for the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> he will <S%H5414>give<s%> them to the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> <S%H7451>Behold,<s%> evil shall go <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H1471>nation<s%> to <S%H1471>nation,<s%> and a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5591>storm<s%> shall be raised <S%H5782>up<s%> from the uttermost <S%H3411>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

The <S%H2491>slain<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> shall be at that <S%H3117>day<s%> from one <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> even to the other <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> they shall not be <S%H5594>lamented,<s%> neither <S%H622>gathered,<s%> nor <S%H6912>buried;<s%> they shall be <S%H1828>dung<s%> <S%H6440>on<s%> the surface of the <S%H127>ground.<s%>

<S%H3213>Wail,<s%> you <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> and <S%H2199>cry;<s%> and <S%H6428>wallow<s%> in <S%H117>dust,<s%> you principal of the <S%H6629>flock;<s%> for the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2873>slaughter<s%> and of your <S%H8600>dispersions<s%> are fully <S%H4390>come,<s%> and you shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> like a <S%H2532>goodly<s%> <S%H3627>vessel.<s%>
The <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> shall have no <S%H4498>way<s%> to <S%H6>flee,<s%> nor the <S%H117>principal<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock<s%> to <S%H6413>escape.<s%>

A <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H6818>cry<s%> of the <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> and the <S%H3215>wailing<s%> of the <S%H117>principal<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock!<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> lays <S%H7703>waste<s%> their <S%H4830>pasture.<s%>
The <S%H7965>peaceable<s%> <S%H4999>folds<s%> are brought to <S%H1826>silence<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

He has <S%H5800>left<s%> his <S%H5520>covert,<s%> as the <S%H3715>lion;<s%> for their <S%H776>land<s%> has become an <S%H8047>astonishment<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of the <S%H3238>oppression,<s%> and <S%H6440>because<s%> of his <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger.<s%>
